original_text: Then they must cover all those things with a red cloth. On the top of the red cloth, they must put good leather. Then they must fix the poles to the table, so that they can carry it.
korean_text: 홍색 보자기를 그 위에 펴고 그것을 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮은 후에 그 채를 꿰고

sentences.original_text: Then they must cover all those things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 그 모든 것을 덮어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: On the top of the red cloth
Then they must fix the poles to the table
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 그들은 채들을 상에 고정해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: so that they can carry it
